subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Cliff Lee, the Phillies’ starting pitcher, dominated the Dodgers’ lineup, and the Phillies’ bats were alive all night in Game 3. The Phillies lead the series, 2-1.
snippet: Cliff Lee, the Phillies’ starting pitcher, dominated the Dodgers’ lineup, and the Phillies’ bats were alive all night in Game 3. The Phillies lead the series, 2-1.
